Blood Tithes are Meiyerditch citizens who are being publicly tithed by the vampyres. They are found across the vampyre capital Darkmeyer chained to the walls of various buildings across the middle and higher tier of the city. They cannot be interacted with, but the vyre residents of Darkmeyer will occasionally snack on them when they pass them.

Using a blood pint on them triggers a dialogue where the player will offer the blood back to the tithe, though the tithe is too exhausted to respond.

'''Blood Tithes''' are [[Meiyerditch]] [[Meiyerditch citizen|citizens]] who are being publicly [[blood tithe|tithed]] by the [[vampyre]]s. They are found across the vampyre capital [[Darkmeyer]] chained to the walls of various buildings across the middle and higher tier of the city. They cannot be interacted with, but the [[vyre]] residents of Darkmeyer will occasionally snack on them when they pass them.

Using a [[blood pint]] on them triggers a dialogue where the player will offer the blood back to the tithe, though the tithe is too exhausted to respond.
